title: Gakkatsu!
synopsis: In a fictional school, "Tender Tank" Rareko is constantly opening absurd yet strangely enthusiastic debates, this way creating a lively classroom life. Bringing up tremendous themes, she and her classmates exchange words like sword-strokes, and here and there even a profound remark is slipped in.
voices: ['Kawasho, Miyuki', 'Naga, Ami', 'Naga, Ami', 'CR Okamoto, Monogatari', 'Naga, Ami', 'Naga, Ami', 'Naga, Ami', 'Terui, Haruka', 'Arai, Souta', 'Naga, Ami']
